Question & Options:
Which individuals were involved in the production and storytelling of the movie 'Gully Boy'?
Options:
A. A) Akhtar
B. B) Naezy
C. C) DIVINE
D. D) Nas
Correct Answer: A) Akhtar, B) Naezy, C) DIVINE, D) Nas

Which statements accurately describe the relationships among the MCs and hip-hop culture?
Options:
A. A) Naezy is one of the Mumbai based MCs.
B. B) DIVINE is part of the hip-hop culture.
C. C) MCs contribute to the hip-hop culture.
D. D) Both Naezy and DIVINE are part of the hip-hop culture.
Correct Answer: A) Naezy is one of the Mumbai based MCs., B) DIVINE is part of the hip-hop culture., C) MCs contribute to the hip-hop culture., D) Both Naezy and DIVINE are part of the hip-hop culture.
